title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Context-Based Mathematics e-Learning Material Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and fundamental computer literacy
context.additional_context: Fostering the ability to apply mathematical concepts through project-based assessment in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more context-based mathematical learning scenarios for real-world problem-solving
Learners can create and distribute executable digital educational materials within a given technical environment
Learners can explain the process of improving their designs by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
